channel.title: Friend can't get on
channel.description:
I've been coding for a good deal of time and I know what I'm supposed to do. I have the basics down, I have the port 43594 open My No-IP is up The client I gave to my friend has my No-IP in the client.java and GUI.java My client has 127.0.0.1, mine works, his doesn't.
The base is the TeamTorva/Tkoscape
Skype me, ian.lehrer

item.title: Friend can't get on
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

People still using that crappy base of mine? lol…

Make sure you are ported through the firewall!

Read full topic
